title: Committees
content:
## Functions What’s poppin’ party people, we are Macie and Bobby and we are your FUNctions Co-Chairs! Our committee plans FEAST events including the Halloween social and the end of year banquet. We can’t wait meet the class of ‘25!
![](/images/uploads/functions.jpg)
## Fundraising Howdy! We are the fundraising committee. Our names are Hayden Hall and Jessica Horton, but more importantly we are the loudest and the proudest members of the Fightin Texas Aggie class of 2024 A-A-A-A-A! Our committee is mostly in charge of events such as profit shares, as well as organizing committee olympics. If you are looking for a fun committee, definitely look out for Fundraising!
![](/images/uploads/fundraising.jpg)
## Promo What’s up guys it’s Gabi and Mac, your promo co-chairs and the best people on Earth.  We are excited to meet all of the freshmen and deliver the upmost drippiness to our members.  Last year promo had two merch drops and we are planning for the same if not more… and drippier. With that being said, we will leave you with a quote from a famous prophet, Dominique Jones, aka Lil Baby: “Drip or drown, but we know how to swim.” 
![](/images/uploads/promo.jpg)
## Service League Howdy! Our names are Sydney and Logan and we are the Service League committee (SLEAG if you’re cool). We are in charge of FEAST’s philanthropy and service events. Last year we adopted a street (peep University drive east), and worked a fun run for charity. We can’t wait to meet the class of 2025. We’re making SLEAG cool again in 2021 so Rush SLEAG.
![](/images/uploads/serviceleague.jpg)
## Leadership Howdy! We are the fundraising committee. Our names are Hayden Hall and Jessica Horton, but more importantly we are the loudest and the proudest members of the Fightin Texas Aggie class of 2024 A-A-A-A-A! Our committee is mostly in charge of events such as profit shares, as well as organizing committee olympics. If you are looking for a fun committee, definitely look out for Fundraising!
![](/images/uploads/leadership.jpg)
## 12th Man Howdy Army! We are Cammy and Rufus, the 12th man co-chairs! We are so excited to plan elevated hangouts, good bull nights, game of the week, and a sick tailgate. If you join 12th Man, be prepared to be in the most legendary committee ever. We can’t wait to meet you, Class of 2025, and let’s get this year started!
![](/images/uploads/12thman.jpg)
